name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MyAlerts helps you to find something !

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MyAlerts helps you to find something : stolen bike, new home, cool project to bake on

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The web is great, you can find your new home, you can by cool used-car, you can help project to grow with crowdfunding. But the web is also used by bad guy to sell stolen products. 
MyAlerts will help you to retrieve your stolen bike. It will help you to find your new home. It will help you to find a cool present. And it will also help you to support a cool project via crowdfunding. 

first visit http://myalerts.org and create an account. Then install the extension, visit websites like kickstarter or leboncoin and just click on the exension to capture your current search. Then return on http://myalerts.org to get near real-time results. 

If you want more website to be managed by the app, just contact me.
